blocks.text: Olympics Gold on the Line as Oftebro Chases Nordic Combined Glory
Thursday is Norway's day. Jens Luraas Oftebro leads the charge in Nordic Combined at Milano-Cortina, while Hovland hunts a signature win at Riviera. Two stages, two medal shots.
